column4: Can the user see a list of available quests?
column5: 1. From anywhere within City View, click on "Quests" in the footer.
column6: A list of quests should appear for the user to complete.

column4: Can the user see which quests have been completed?
column5:
1. From anywhere within City View, click on "Quests" in the footer.
2. Complete a Quest item.
3. Check the Quests page.
column6: The user should be able to see which Quests have been completed.

column4: Is the user rewarded correctly, when a Quest is complete?
column5:
1. From anywhere within City View, click on "Quests" in the footer. 
2. Complete a Quest item. 
3. Check the Quests page.
